definition: cavity of body/barrel (e.g. engine cylinder)/compartment/tune/accent of speech

sentences.english: Chapter III the thinking to further improve the art of singing tone.
sentences.chinese: 第四章对进一步完善河南越调唱腔艺术的思考。

sentences.english: Henan Opera aria music belongs to the system of Banqiang-style clapper melody.
sentences.chinese: 豫剧唱腔音乐属板腔体梆子腔系统。

sentences.english: Guizhou opera arias are sung in Guizhou dialect.
sentences.chinese: 黔剧唱腔是用贵州方言演唱的。

sentences.english: Her singing has a special pleasing quality about it.
Singing in the extensive use of the word form word liner.
sentences.chinese: 唱腔中大量运用衬字虚词。

sentences.english: The singers' plaintive squeals form the soundtrack of our lives.
sentences.chinese: 那些京剧演员哀伤的唱腔成了我们生活的配乐。

sentences.english: Vocal music is one of the most distinguishing features in Chinese operas.
sentences.chinese: 构成剧种特色的最主要因素莫过于音乐唱腔。

sentences.english: East road "Er-ren-tai" melodies persuasive smooth, the melody is changeable.
sentences.chinese: 东路二人台的唱腔则婉转流畅，旋律变化多端。

sentences.english: All the selected rhyme schemes are notated according to recordings.
sentences.chinese: 所有唱腔选段均依据录音记谱。

sentences.english: Music and singing harmony is also another characteristic of Shua Haier.
sentences.chinese: 唱腔与音乐伴奏十分和谐也是耍孩儿的又一特点。

sentences.english: Her voice rises, falls, in a consciously sweet singsong.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音时起时落，有意识地用着一种甜美的唱腔。

sentences.english: "Seven-word song" is one of the major tunes in Taiwanese Opera.
sentences.chinese: 是歌仔戏唱腔中最主要的曲调。

definition: dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)
to sing opera music (without staging or make up)
a general term for local operas in Shangxi, Henan, Hebei, Shandong etc/the music of such operas
sung performance/to sing for an audience
